actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties

official_title: To amend title 4, United States Code, to authorize members of the Armed Forces not in uniform and veterans to render a military salute during the recitation of the pledge of allegiance.

summary.text: Allows members of the Armed Forces and veterans who are out of uniform to render the military salute during the recitation of the pledge of allegiance.

titles.title: To amend title 4, United States Code, to authorize members of the Armed Forces not in uniform and veterans to render a military salute during the recitation of the pledge of allegiance.
